signup_form_page.terms_of_service_text: I agree with the terms of service

terms_conditions.contact_support: If you have any questions or concerns about our use of cookies or user session storage, please contact us at
terms_conditions.cookie_usage: Acceptance Terms for Cookie Usage and User Session Storage
terms_conditions.cookie_usage_description: By using our web application, you agree to the following terms regarding the use of cookies and user session storage:
terms_conditions.explicit_consent_description: By accessing our web application, you explicitly consent to the use of cookies and user session storage in accordance with this policy.
terms_conditions.opt_in_cookies_description: You have the option to specifically consent to the use of third-party cookies for activity analysis or other purposes. This consent can be given or withdrawn at any time in your account settings.
terms_conditions.privacy_policy_description: You acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to our privacy policy, which details what data is collected, how it is used, shared, and stored.
terms_conditions.session_expiration_description: Please note that user sessions may expire after a defined period of inactivity or in accordance with our internal session management policies.
terms_conditions.withdraw_consent_description: You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. Consent withdrawal can be done by modifying your account settings or by following the instructions provided in our privacy policy.

user_actions.create_page_text: From here, you can create your public page listing all the services you use daily
